name: Funny Animal Bubble Pop
description:
Funny Animal Bubble Pop is an amazingly cool and fun game that challenges you to pop the bubbles before they get low enough to touch the cute little critter heroes!
Features:

- Fun bubble shooter game
- Awesome user experience
- Cool baby animal critter heroes
- Great graphics and in-game effects
- Many exciting levels to unlock and play
- Challenging to play but simple to understand
